ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Council Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, it wasn t me. I went over to vote Yes , and found that it wasn t there, so I made my post instead about the new system I was making.

Yeah, it wasn't me. I went over to vote 'Yes', and found that it
wasn't there, so I made my post instead about the new system I was
making.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., SaratogaTek@y... wrote:
> I have noticed that someone has deleted the poll I made.  It was not 
> I and after some discussion I had with him it was probably not 
> Yanshosh either.  That means that one of the other Council members 
> deleted it because it threatened them.  This only proves that the 
> council needs an overhaul.
